---
title: "In the Media"
listing:
  type: grid
  fields: [image, title, date, description, categories]
  sort: "date desc"
  categories: true
page-layout: article
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    include-in-header:
      - text: |
          <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.4/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
---
<p id="last-updated" style="font-style: italic; font-size: 0.9em;"></p>

<script>
  const lastUpdated = new Date(document.lastModified);
  document.getElementById("last-updated").innerText = 
    `Last updated: ${lastUpdated.toLocaleString('en-US', {
      year: 'numeric',
      month: 'long',
      day: 'numeric',
      hour: 'numeric',
      minute: '2-digit',
      hour12: true
    })}`;
</script>
